Articles.Content:
I have successfully complete a redirect of an Asteroid. All I can say is Wow. I am seriously impressed with the work that has gone into this update.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

This one was an easy one, truth be told. It was a Class C, and it entered Kerbin's SOI such that it only needed the tiniest of nudges to put it into a stable orbit. I will spend more time trying to get it down to a 0 inclination orbit than I spent capturing it. It will be an excellent beginning to an orbital base of some kind. My plan is to have one of each type of rock in close orbits to each other. Perhaps some kind of space museum - tourist camp of some kind.

Now I get to redesign all my previous ships using the better engines and tanks for the launchers. What fun!

I have found that the 2.5 meter "liqued booster" replaces the Mainsail handily. Some rebalance may be in order.

That said, nice ship.
Thanks! I don't think there will be a problem with the better engines as long as they are placed near the end of the tech tree. I don't mind parts becoming "obsolete" eventually.
